name: Graveyard Slash
description:
This is my Graveyard Slash game that i made for a project, it's a simple 2D platformer set in a sort of graveyard, with a pixel art style and it has a variety of enemies. You, the Player, have to reach the cave, while destroying enemies, moving through the tough terrain and avoiding spike falls and more, in order to complete the game. The game can be quite difficult if your not paying attention, but you can always restart with R.

Any feedback or criticisms would be greatly appreciated, tell me what you liked, disliked, bugs you found, hows the enemies, platform and more. I'm always open to improve myself.

Controls: 

  • A/D or left/right arrow keys to move.
  • W, up arrow or space bar to Jump.
  • S or down arrow keys to crouch.
  • K or left mouse button to attack.
  • R to restart the game.

Assets used:

  • DungeonFont
  • GothicVania Cemetery
  • Gothicvania Swamp
  • GothicVania Church Pack
  • Retro Noisy Attack Sound Pack Lite
  • Retro Noisy Explosion Sound Pack Lite
  • 30x[8bit Loops]
